scripts.build:debug: tsc -p tsconfig.debug.json && bls-sdk-ts build index.ts -o dist -f debug.wasm && cp public/index.html dist/ && cp public/style.css dist/ || true
scripts.build:release: tsc -p tsconfig.release.json && bls-sdk-ts build index.ts -o dist -f debug.wasm && cp public/index.html dist/ && cp public/style.css dist/ || true
